body_html:
@geyuxiao The delay between tf.estimator.train_and tf.estimator.evalute depends on your model and datasets, among other factors.
The delay is usually very small so the difference in loss should be minimal and is unlikely to have statistical and practical significance.

body:
@geyuxiao The delay between tf.estimator.train_and tf.estimator.evalute depends on your model and datasets, among other factors.
The delay is usually very small so the difference in loss should be minimal and is unlikely to have statistical and practical significance.
